desc: Sneasel is a dual-type Pokémon known for its sharp claws and agile movements.

name: Sneasler
desc: Sneasler is the evolved form of Sneasel and is known for its fierce and venomous attacks.

name: Weavile
desc: Weavile is a cunning and swift Pokémon that uses its sharp claws to take down its prey.

name: Snorunt
desc: Snorunt is an Ice-type Pokémon that is known for its love of cold and snowy environments.

name: Glalie
desc: Glalie is the evolved form of Snorunt and is known for its icy breath and freezing abilities.

name: Froslass
desc: Froslass is an elegant and ghostly Pokémon that can freeze its foes with a breath of cold air.

name: Cranidos
desc: Cranidos is a Rock-type Pokémon known for its powerful headbutting attacks.

name: Rampardos
desc: Rampardos is the evolved form of Cranidos and is known for its incredible headbutt strength.

name: Shieldon
desc: Shieldon is a dual-type Pokémon with both Rock and Steel attributes, known for its defensive capabilities.

name: Bastiodon
desc: Bastiodon is the evolved form of Shieldon and is a sturdy Rock and Steel-type Pokémon.

name: Swinub
desc: Swinub is a dual-type Pokémon known for its love of digging in the ground and searching for food.

name: Piloswine
desc: Piloswine is the evolved form of Swinub and is a powerful Ice and Ground-type Pokémon.

name: Mamoswine
desc: Mamoswine is known for its formidable tusks and is a strong Ice and Ground-type Pokémon.

name: Bergmite
desc: Bergmite is an Ice-type Pokémon known for its icy body and ability to withstand freezing temperatures.

name: Avalugg
desc: Avalugg is an Ice-type Pokémon that can take on the appearance of ancient ice formations in the Hisui region.

name: Snover
desc: Snover is a unique dual-type Pokémon, combining Grass and Ice attributes, often found in snowy areas.

name: Abomasnow
desc: Abomasnow is the evolved form of Snover and is known for its snowy appearance and Ice-type abilities.

name: Zorua
desc: Zorua is a Dark-type Pokémon with the ability to transform and deceive its opponents.

name: Zoroark
desc: Zoroark is known for its illusionary abilities, capable of taking on the appearance of other Pokémon.

name: Rufflet
desc: Rufflet is a dual-type Pokémon, combining Normal and Flying attributes, known for its courage and tenacity.

name: Braviary
desc: Braviary is known as the Hero of the Skies and is a symbol of strength and freedom.

name: Enamorus
desc: Enamorus is a Legendary Pokémon with the power of both Fairy and Flying types, known for its graceful and enchanting presence.

name: Dialga
desc: Dialga is a Legendary Pokémon associated with time and steel, known for its control over time and temporal abilities.

name: Palkia
desc: Palkia is a Legendary Pokémon associated with space and water, known for its ability to distort space and create alternate dimensions.

name: Giratina
desc: Giratina is a Legendary Pokémon known as the Renegade Pokémon, capable of traversing different dimensions and realms.

name: Arceus
desc: Arceus is a Legendary Pokémon known as the Original One, said to have shaped the Pokémon world and possesses the ability to change its type using different Plates.

name: Phione
desc: Phione is known as the Sea Drifter Pokémon and is said to be the child of Manaphy. It shares the same Water type as its parent.

name: Manaphy
desc: Manaphy is known as the Seafaring Pokémon and is said to be the parent of Phione. It possesses the power of the sea.

name: Shaymin
desc: Shaymin is known as the Gratitude Pokémon and has a Sky Forme that allows it to take on a flying type. It's associated with flowers and nature.

name: Darkrai
desc: Darkrai is known as the Pitch-Black Pokémon and is associated with nightmares and darkness. Its presence can induce terrifying dreams.
